function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spreading of false information on social media","Impact":"Unpredicted consequences, such as misinformation about contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing filtration mechanisms and promoting verified information from reputable sources","Technologies":"Content moderation algorithms, fact-checking tools, and verification systems","People":"Social media users, general public","Owner":"Social media platforms, government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"High exposure to and sharing of fake news in specific population sub-sections","Impact":"Concentration of misinformation in certain groups, leading to lack of awareness and incorrect beliefs about contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Developing interventions and educational campaigns targeting the specific sub-sections, combining efforts of government, social media companies, and behavioral scientists","Technologies":"Targeted educational content, behavioral interventions, targeted advertisement algorithms","People":"Specific sub-sections of the population","Owner":"Government, social media companies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of control on the spreading of false content due to social dynamics","Impact":"Uncontrolled propagation of false information leading to misconceptions about contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Studying social dynamics caused by the consumption of false content to understand and control misinformation spreading","Technologies":"Social network analysis, sentiment analysis, misinformation tracking algorithms","People":"General public, social media users","Owner":"Researchers, social media companies, public health organizations"}]}
